mapper.select: SELECT PI.PRODUCT_NO AS PRODUCTNO, PI.CATEGORY AS CATEGORY, PI.PRODUCT_NM AS PRODUCTNM, PI.PRICE AS PRICE, PI.CONTENT AS CONTENT, IV.IT_COUNT AS ITCOUNT, CG.CATEGORY_NM AS CATEGORYNM, TO_CHAR(PI.REG_DTTM,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REGDTTM FROM PRODUCT_INFO PI INNER JOIN INVENTORY IV ON PI.PRODUCT_NO = IV.PRODUCT_NO INNER JOIN CATEGORY CG ON PI.CATEGORY = CG.CATEGORY_NO ORDER BY REG_DTTM ASC
SELECT FILE_NO AS FILENO, ORGNAME AS ORGNAME, SAVENAME AS SAVENAME, FILEPATH AS FILEPATH, FILESIZE AS FILESIZE, REGNO AS REGNO FROM SHOPPINGFILE
